mapper.sql: select pno, name, price, content, category from product
mapper.select: select pno, name, price, content, category from ( select row_number() over(order by pno desc) as rnum, pno, name, price, content, category from product where name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ) where rnum between #{pagingBean.startRowNumber} and #{pagingBean.endRowNumber}
select count(*) from product where name like '%' || #{value} || '%'
select pno,name,price,content,category from product where pno=#{value}

SELECT pd.pdno, pd.pno,pc.pcno, pc.color_name, ps.psno as psno,ps.size_name,ps.size1, ps.size2, ps.size3, ps.size4, ps.size5,pd.inventory FROM product_detail pd, product_color pc, product_size ps WHERE pd.pcno=pc.pcno and pd.psno=ps.psno and pd.pno=#{value}
SELECT i.ino,i.url, i.pno FROM product p, image i WHERE i.pno=p.pno and p.pno=#{value}

SELECT ps.psno ,ps.size_name,ps.size1, ps.size2, ps.size3, ps.size4, ps.size5,pd.inventory FROM product_detail pd, product_color pc, product_size ps WHERE pd.pcno=pc.pcno and pd.psno=ps.psno and pd.pcno=#{pcno} and pd.pno=#{pno}

SELECT pno, name, price, content, category from (select row_number() over(order by pno desc) as rnum,pno,price,name,category,content from Product) product where rnum between #{startRowNumber} and #{endRowNumber} ORDER BY pno DESC
select count(*) from product
select count(*) from product where category=#{value}

SELECT pno, name, price, content, category from (select row_number() over(order by pno desc) as rnum,pno,price,name,category,content from Product where category=#{category}) product where rnum between #{startNumber} and #{endNumber} ORDER BY pno DESC

select distinct ps.size_name, ps.size1, ps.size2, ps.size3, ps.size4, ps.size5 from PRODUCT_DETAIL pd, PRODUCT_SIZE ps, product p where p.pno=pd.pno and ps.psno=pd.psno and p.pno=#{value} order by ps.size_name desc
mapper.insert:
select pno_seq.nextval from dual
insert into product(pno,name,price,content,category) values(#{pno},#{name},#{price},#{content},#{category})

select psno_seq.nextval from dual
insert into product_size(psno,size_name,size1,size2,size3,size4,size5) values(#{psno},#{size_name},#{size1},#{size2},#{size3},#{size4},#{size5})

select pcno_seq.nextval from dual
insert into product_color(pcno, color_name) values(#{pcno},#{color_name})
mapper.select: select pcno from product_color where color_name=#{color_name}
select count(*) from review r, product_detail pd, product p where r.pdno=pd.pdno and pd.pno=p.pno and p.pno=#{value}
mapper.update: update product set hit=hit+1 where pno=#{value}
mapper.select: SELECT pno, name, price, content, category,hit from (select row_number() over(order by hit desc) as rnum,pno,price,name,category,content,hit from Product) product where rnum between #{startRowNumber} and #{endRowNumber} ORDER BY hit DESC
select count(*) from product_qna where pno=#{value}
mapper.update: update review set content=#{content} where rno=#{rno}
mapper.select: select count(*) from review r, product_detail pd, product p where r.pdno=pd.pdno and pd.pno=p.pno

select r.rno, r.pdno, pd.pno, pc.color_name, ps.size_name, r.id, r.content, r.regdate from (select rno, pdno, id, content, regdate, row_number() over(order by rno desc) as rnum from review) r, (select pdno,pno,pcno,psno from product_detail) pd, (select pcno,color_name from product_color) pc, (select psno,size_name from product_size) ps where (r.pdno=pd.pdno) and (pd.pcno=pc.pcno) and (ps.psno=pd.psno) and rnum between #{startRowNumber} and #{endRowNumber}
select count(*) from product_qna
